channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MN

item.title: Report X-2024040135
item.description:
Report X-2024040135

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-11T15:11:27+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-02
  • City: MINNEAPOLIS
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: AN UNLOADER ON B-UNLOAD ENCOUNTERED A WET PACKAGE IN TRAILER WITH HAZ MAT MARKINGS. A RESPONDER WAS CALLED AND THE PACKAGE WAS TRANSPORTED TO THE DMP FOR PROCESSING. UPON INSPECTION, IT WAS FOUND THAT THE BOX CONTAINED FOUR PLASTIC BOTTLES OF REAGENT GRADE ALCOHOL, ONE OF WHICH WAS CRACKED. THE PACKAGE WAS PROCESSED PER PROPER DMP PROCEDURES.
